name: Relyable
overview:
Relyable allows automotive salespeople to demonstrate personal and professional credibility to shoppers looking to avoid disreputable or unknown salespeople.

Relyable.org is an individual Reputation Marketing Systemâ„¢ for auto sales. Using a simple email rating request, salespeople collect testimonials and referrals for display, creating a self-governing relationship of mutual benefit that mirrors the dynamic that produces “tipping” or other gratuities.

Current industry survey practices do not generate public, individual scores by salesperson or dealership. Relyable offers ethical salespeople a way to attract savvy shoppers. Relyable membership for salespeople is free forever and offers a tool for ongoing display of testimonials through a personal URL used in email signatures, business cards and other marketing efforts.

Dealer Members have Administrative abilities to manage metrics used to syndicate reviews throughout the web and on embedded widgets for dealer marketing pages.
